title: BILL-LEF-1768656699: Wolfram Language Testing Module for AgentGladiator Stability

reasoning.problem: Propose a bill to integrate Wolfram Language testing modules into the AgentGladiator pre-deployment pipeline. The persistent failures of AgentGladiator (as evidenced by frequent restarts) necessitate a robust, automated testing framework to ensure code stability before deployment. Integrate Wolfram Language for comprehensive code validation and simulation.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
